item.description:
BYOI (That's Bring Your Own Improv) is back! You can get some more information here:

http://bringyourownimprov.com/default.htm

It's essentially the same thing as the TV Show Whose Line Is It Anyway? Audience members can sit and clap, yell out suggestions when needed, or, for those of us daring enough, can go up and participate in the onstage happenings. Here's some of the things they do:

http://bringyourownimprov.com/Games.htm

Tickets are $5 at the door, and keep in mind that BYOI is both BYOB (Bring Your Own Bottle/Booze) and BYOF (Bring Your Own Food), so feel free to bring pizza, sandwiches, drinks, etc. Just be sure to clean up after yourself.

NOTE: The Perishible Theater is no longer there, but the address is the correct one for the location of the BYOI this evening.Â  Please reach out to me if you can't locate us.
item.how_to_find_us: Will send out my number the day before for those that don't have it.
item.name: BYOI (Bring Your Own Improv)
